name: hydejack
description: Hydejack is a pretentious two-column [Jekyll](http://jekyllrb.com) theme, stolen by [`@qwtel`](https://twitter.com/qwtel) from [Hyde](http://hyde.getpoole.com). You could say it was.. [hydejacked](http://media3.giphy.com/media/makedRIckZBW8/giphy.gif).

scripts.build: mkdir -p assets/js && cat _includes/header.txt > assets/js/hydejack-$npm_package_version.js; cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify _js/src/index.js -g browserify-css -g stringify -g babelify | uglifyjs -c -m >> assets/js/hydejack-$npm_package_version.js
scripts.watch: mkdir -p assets/js && watchify -d _js/src/index.js -g browserify-css -g stringify -g babelify -o assets/js/hydejack-$npm_package_version.js
scripts.dev: npm run watch & npm run serve
scripts.prepare: npm run test && npm run clean && npm run build

author: Florian Klampfer <mail@qwtel.com> (https://qwtel.com/)
